gl-color-background-membership.description: Default background color for membership communication and offers

gl-color-background-highlight.description: Alternative background color to create vibrancy and interest over the default background color; used for customer acqusition

gl-color-sale-background.description: Default background color for promotional interface elements

gl-color-background-transparent.description: Alternative background color for invisible interface elements; use it for technical reasons mainly

gl-productcard-media-color-background.description: Default background color for product cards media section

gl-color-border-hover.description: Default border color for interface elements on hover user interaction

gl-color-border-alternative-active.description: Alternative border color for active interface elements; used especially for selected states where background color doesn't change

gl-color-border-navigational.description: Default border color for interface elements related to user navigation

gl-color-border-navigational-inverse.description: Default border color for interface elements related to user navigation on non-default or busy backgrounds

gl-color-border-functional.description: Default border color for interface elements where user interaction happens in place

gl-color-border-disabled.description: Default border color for disabled / non-interactable elements

gl-color-border-membership.description: Default border color to use for user membership interaction around interface elements

gl-color-border-membership-hover.description: Default border color to use for user membership hover interaction around interface elements

gl-callout-color-background-alternative.description: Alternative background color for the lowest urgency level callout

gl-callout-color-border-urgent.description: Border color of the urgent callout to create contrast from the background

gl-button-color-border-primary-inverse.description: Alternative border color for primary buttons over non-default or busy backgrounds to create depth

gl-button-color-border-secondary-hoverin.description: Default hover border color for secondary buttons over non-default or busy backgrounds. To create dark interface elements and sections over the default border color when hovering.

gl-color-text-hover.description: Default color to communicate interaction of a text element over default background color

gl-color-text-membership.description: Default color to communicate membership-related messages with the users

gl-placeholder-color-text.description: Text color for our interactable interface elements where text aid needed for the best results

gl-label-color-text.description: Default text color for labels over the default background, regardless of the position

gl-timer-color-background.description: Background color for the timer to create contrast with the countdown progress element

gl-timer-color-progress-background.description: Background color of the time progress to communicate important dates for the users

gl-tooltip-color-background.description: Background color for the tooltip to create a higher contrast over the different background colors

gl-color-error.description: Default color to use for error sates of interface elements

gl-color-success.description: Default color to use for success states of interface elements
